about_the_game:
...Well, that's certainly one way you can make your time worthwhile. They've gotta repopulate now, right?



This free DLC adds an option to enable adult content, such as nudity and sex scenes. This has very little effect on the game as a whole, and is completely optional.

All of the characters involved in the adult content are legal, consenting adults and pass the Harkness test. Please keep in mind that there are some LGBTQ+ elements, and there may be a few weird fetish-y things as well. Please continue at your own discretion.

content_descriptors.notes:
-Violence, blood, gore, dismemberment and body horror which is presented in a cartoonish artstyle
-Themes that discuss or relate to depression, anxiety, suicide, mental disorders, personality disorders, and other topics that may be distressing to the player
-Strong language and crude humor
-Sexual/suggestive themes and events
-Explicit sex & nudity
-References to religion and politics
-References to drug, tobacco, and alcohol use
